languages.text: "Сначала Леди Теодора хотела казнить меня за то, что случилось, но после остыла и великодушно согласилась исполнить уговор. Но... куда мне было идти? Мои мертвецы были здесь".

"At first, Lady Theodora wanted to have me executed for what had happened, but then she regained her composure and graciously agreed to honour our deal. But... where was I to go? My dead were all here."
languages.original_text: "Сначала Леди Теодора хотела казнить меня за то, что случилось, но после остыла и великодушно согласилась исполнить уговор. Но... куда мне было идти? Мои мертвецы были здесь".

traits.locale_text: "At first, Lady Theodora wanted to have me executed for what had happened, but then she cooled down and graciously agreed to honour our deal. But... where was I to go? Here was where my dead ones were."

"At first, Lady Theodora wanted to have me executed for what had happened, but then she cooled down and graciously agreed to honour our deal. But... where was I to go? Here was where my dead ones were."

"At first, Lady Theodora wanted to have me executed for what had happened, but then she regained her composure and graciously agreed to honour our deal. But... where was I to go? Here was where my dead ones were."

"At first, Lady Theodora wanted to have me executed for what had happened, but then she regained her composure and graciously agreed to honour our deal. But... where was I to go? My dead were all here."

"At first, Lady Theodora wanted to have me executed for what had happened, but then she regained her composure and graciously agreed to honour our deal. But... where was I to go? My dead were all here."

languages.text: «Al principio, lady Theodora quiso ejecutarme por lo ocurrido, pero después recuperó la compostura y aceptó con magnanimidad honrar nuestro trato. Pero... ¿adónde iba a ir? Mis muertos estaban aquí».
languages.original_text: "At first, Lady Theodora wanted to have me executed for what had happened, but then she regained her composure and graciously agreed to honour our deal. But... where was I to go? My dead were all here."

traits.locale_text: «Al principio, lady Theodora quiso ejecutarme por lo ocurrido, pero después recuperó la compostura y aceptó con magnanimidad honrar nuestro trato. Pero... ¿adónde iba a ir? Mis muertos estaban aquí».

languages.text: 「当初、事件のことでシオドーラ様は私を処刑する気でいたが、その後は気持ちが落ち着かれて、寛大にも取引を守ることに頷いてくれた。しかし…私はどこへ行けばいいのだろう？私が手にかけた死は全てここにあるのに」
languages.original_text: "At first, Lady Theodora wanted to have me executed for what had happened, but then she regained her composure and graciously agreed to honour our deal. But... where was I to go? My dead were all here."

traits.locale_text: 「当初、事件のことでシオドーラ様は私を処刑する気でいたが、その後は気持ちが落ち着かれて、寛大にも取引を守ることに頷いてくれた。しかし…私はどこへ行けばいいのだろう？私が手にかけた死は全てここにあるのに」

languages.text: “发生了那样的事情，西奥多拉夫人本打算把我处决，但后来她恢复了冷静，大大方方地履行了我们之间的协议。可……我又能去哪里呢？我所有学徒都死在了这里。”
languages.original_text: "At first, Lady Theodora wanted to have me executed for what had happened, but then she regained her composure and graciously agreed to honour our deal. But... where was I to go? My dead were all here."

traits.locale_text: “发生了那样的事情，西奥多拉夫人本打算把我处决，但后来她恢复了冷静，大大方方地履行了我们之间的协议。可……我又能去哪里呢？我所有学徒都死在了这里。”

languages.text: "Zuerst wollte Lady Theodora mich für das Geschehene hinrichten lassen, doch dann fasste sie sich wieder und willigte gnädigerweise ein, sich an unsere Abmachung zu halten. Doch ... wohin sollte ich gehen? Meine Toten waren alle hier."
languages.original_text: "At first, Lady Theodora wanted to have me executed for what had happened, but then she regained her composure and graciously agreed to honour our deal. But... where was I to go? My dead were all here."

traits.locale_text: "Zuerst wollte Lady Theodora mich für das Geschehene hinrichten lassen, doch dann fasste sie sich wieder und willigte gnädigerweise ein, sich an unsere Abmachung zu halten. Doch ... wohin sollte ich gehen? Meine Toten waren alle hier."

languages.text: « Au début, dame Théodora voulait me faire exécuter pour ce qui s'était passé, mais une fois la colère passée, elle a changé d'avis et accepté d'honorer notre marché. Pour autant... où aurais-je bien pu aller alors que tous mes morts étaient ici ? »
languages.original_text: "At first, Lady Theodora wanted to have me executed for what had happened, but then she regained her composure and graciously agreed to honour our deal. But... where was I to go? My dead were all here."

traits.locale_text: « Au début, dame Théodora voulait me faire exécuter pour ce qui s'était passé, mais une fois la colère passée, elle a changé d'avis et accepté d'honorer notre marché. Pour autant... où aurais-je bien pu aller alors que tous mes morts étaient ici ? »

languages.text: "Leydi Theodora, en başta yaşananlar için beni infaz etmek istedi. Fakat aklını yeniden başına topladığında nezaket göstererek anlaşmamıza uymayı kabul etti. Ancak... Bana gidecek bir yer mi kalmıştı? Ölülerimin hepsi buradaydı."
languages.original_text: "At first, Lady Theodora wanted to have me executed for what had happened, but then she regained her composure and graciously agreed to honour our deal. But... where was I to go? My dead were all here."
